Layers
======

ipyopenlayers provides several types of layers for visualizing geographic data in interactive maps. Each layer type offers distinct features and capabilities, catering to various use cases in mapping and geospatial analysis. Below is you will find the available layers:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   
   tilelayer
   rastertilelayer
   vectortilelayer
   heatmap
   geojson
   geotiff
   

.. automodule:: ipyopenlayers.openlayers.Layer
   :members:
